name: Socrates
quotes: Mankind at large is what I wish to deal with; and so I have got her, well assured that if I can endure her, I shall have no difficulty in my relations with all the rest of human kind.

name: Xenophon
quotes: the hardest to get along with of all the women there areâ€“yes, or all that ever were, I suspect, or ever will be.

name: Aristotle
quotes: Socrates...was busying himself about ethical matters and... seeking the universal in these matters, and fixed thought for the first time on universal definitions.

name: Critias
quotes: Socrates is guilty of not believing in the gods in which the state believes, but brings in other new divinities; he also wrongs by corrupting the youth.

name: Charmides
quotes: Socrates is guilty of not believing in the gods in which the state believes, but brings in other new divinities; he also wrongs by corrupting the youth.
